channel.title: Restart/Run/Comile.bat?
channel.description:
I need a RestartServer.bat A Run.bat and a Compile.bat
My bin folder is located @ [Code] F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin [/Code]
Please dont give me a bat file that has all 3 in one. I want the seperated.
~Joery~[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 12:33:04 AM[/size][hr]Bump.
Soz i know it isnt allowed but if i dont do it i will never get a reply.

item.title: Restart/Run/Comile.bat?
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

ok, i think that your bin is actually in F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_##\bin

is where your update version is, but this is a compile code that always works for mine.

@echo off
"F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_##\bin\Javac.eve -cp . *.java
pause

My java is actually in the C drive but it should work. And if it is actually in you Program Files (x86) then put that in. Again ## stands for your update version.

Read full topic
